content: i am testing several different servers from the hosted crucible at projectcrucible.org, but i am not understanding how to configure authorization info...i see some "lock" icons on some servers, but when i try to enter the auth info i was provided, i just get an error. is there some docs explaining this process? thanks
Doug, please see the Crucible README.md which has an explanation: https://github.com/fhir-crucible/crucible#registration
Let me know if this is unclear.

i hadn't been to that page in a while as i was working from the ubuntu install pages previously. :-/ also, andre told me on a different thread that the pop-up is only enabled if the server supports the smart-on-fhir oauth extensions...but i think my troubles with this server go deeper. thanks again

@Douglas Harley Working through authorization issues was non-trivial as we worked with some of the Argonaut implementation program participants. We ran into a variety of issues that had to be resolved on the server side to get things working properly.
thanks for the heads-up...i am finding the same. you worked on that during the connect-a-thon? is there a thread or something that discusses?
